scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Forums_CreateEditPost_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
$core_v2_page.AddLink('stylesheet', $core_v2_widget.GetExecutedFileUrl('style.less'), "%{ Position = 'AfterTheme' }") #set($forum = false) #set($forum = $core_v2_forum.Current) #set ($supportsQuestionThreads = false) #foreach ($threadType in $forum.AllowedThreadTypes) #if ($threadType == 'QuestionAndAnswer') #set($supportsQuestionThreads = true) #end #end #set($threadOrReplyType = 'thread') #set($threadOrReply = false) #set($replyToThreadOrReply = false) #set($replyToThread = false) #set($contentTypeId = $core_v2_forumThread.ContentTypeId) #if($core_v2_forumReply.Current) #set($threadOrReply = $core_v2_forumReply.Current) #set($threadOrReplyType = 'reply') #set($contentTypeId = $core_v2_forumReply.ContentTypeId) #if (!$core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_forumPermissions.ModifyPost, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, "%{ ContentId = $threadOrReply.ContentId, ContentTypeId = $contentTypeId }").IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set($replyToThread = $core_v2_forumThread.Get($threadOrReply.ThreadId)) #elseif($core_v2_forumThread.Current) #set($threadOrReply = $core_v2_forumThread.Current) #set($threadOrReplyType = 'thread') #set($contentTypeId = $core_v2_forumThread.ContentTypeId) #if(!$core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_forumPermissions.ModifyPost, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, "%{ ContentId = $threadOrReply.ContentId, ContentTypeId = $contentTypeId }").IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set($replyToThread = $core_v2_forumThread.Current) #elseif($core_v2_forumReply.CurrentParent) #set($replyToThreadOrReply = $core_v2_forumReply.CurrentParent) #set($replyToType = 'reply') #set($threadOrReplyType = 'reply') #set($contentTypeId = $core_v2_forumReply.ContentTypeId) #if (!$core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_forumPermissions.CreateReply, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, "%{ ContentId = $replyToThreadOrReply.ContentId, ContentTypeId = $contentTypeId }").IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set($replyToThread = $core_v2_forumThread.Get($replyToThreadOrReply.ThreadId)) #elseif ($core_v2_forumThread.CurrentParent) #set($replyToThreadOrReply = $core_v2_forumThread.CurrentParent) #set($replyToType = 'thread') #set($threadOrReplyType = 'reply') #set($contentTypeId = $core_v2_forumThread.ContentTypeId) #if (!$core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_forumPermissions.CreateReply, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, "%{ ContentId = $replyToThreadOrReply.ContentId, ContentTypeId = $contentTypeId }").IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set($replyToThread = $replyToThreadOrReply) #elseif(!$core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_forumPermissions.CreatePost, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, "%{ ApplicationId = $forum.ApplicationId, ApplicationTypeId = $core_v2_forum.ApplicationTypeId }").IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #if(!$replyToThreadOrReply) #if($core_v2_forumReply.CurrentParent) #set($replyToThreadOrReply = $core_v2_forumReply.CurrentParent) #elseif ($core_v2_forumThread.CurrentParent) #set($replyToThreadOrReply = $core_v2_forumThread.CurrentParent) #end #end #set($uploadUrl = false) #set($uploadUrl = $core_v2_forumUrls.UploadAttachment($forum.Id)) #set($tempData = false) #if ($core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('tsid')) #set($tempDataString = false) #set($tempDataString = $core_v2_utility.GetTemporaryData($core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('tsid'))) #if($tempDataString) #set($tempData = $core_v2_page.ParseQueryString($tempDataString)) #end #end
#if ($threadOrReply)

$threadOrReply.Subject

#elseif ($threadOrReplyType == 'reply')

$core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('ReplyTo'), $replyToThreadOrReply.Subject)

#elseif ($forum.AllowedThreadTypes.Count > 1)

$core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('NewQuestionOrDiscussion'), $forum.Name)

#elseif ($forum.AllowedThreadTypes.get_Item(0) == 'QuestionAndAnswer')

$core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('NewQuestion'), $forum.Name)

#else

$core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('NewDiscussion'), $forum.Name)

#end
    #if ($threadOrReplyType == 'thread' && $core_v2_forumConfiguration.EnableThreadStatus && $forum.AllowedThreadTypes.Count > 1) #set($threadType = $forum.DefaultThreadType) #set($threadType = $threadOrReply.ThreadType)
    • #end #if ($replyToThreadOrReply)
  • $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_ReplyFormat'), $replyToThreadOrReply.Author.DisplayName, $core_v2_language.FormatDateAndTime($replyToThreadOrReply.Date)) $replyToThreadOrReply.Body('WebQuote') $core_v2_language.GetResource('Button_Quote')
    • #end #if ($threadOrReplyType == 'thread')
    • #end
  • #set($body = '') #if($threadOrReply) #set($body = $threadOrReply.Body('raw')) #elseif($tempData) #set($body = $tempData.Value('body')) #end $core_v2_editor.Render('PostBody', "%{Width='100%', Value=$body, ContentTypeId=$contentTypeId, ApplicationId=$forum.ApplicationId, ApplicationTypeId=$core_v2_forum.ApplicationTypeId}")
    • #if ($threadOrReplyType == 'thread')
    • #end #if (!$threadOrReply && $core_v2_user.IsRegistered($core_v2_user.Accessing.Id))
    • #end #if ($threadOrReply && $core_v2_forumConfiguration.DisplayEditNotes)
    • #end ## Only show attachment form for threads/replies that already have them #if ($uploadUrl && $!threadOrReply.File && ($core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_forumPermissions.AttachFileLocal, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, "%{ ApplicationId = $forum.ApplicationId, ApplicationTypeId = $core_v2_forum.ApplicationTypeId }").IsAllowed || $core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_forumPermissions.AttachFileRemote, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, "%{ ApplicationId = $forum.ApplicationId, ContentTypeId = $core_v2_forum.ApplicationTypeId }").IsAllowed))
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_Attachment') $!threadOrReply.File.FileName #if ($threadOrReply && $threadOrReply.File) $core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_UpdateAttachment')#else $core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_AddAttachment')#end $core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_RemoveAttachment')
    • #end #if ($replyToThreadOrReply) #if($replyToThread && $replyToThread.ThreadType == 'QuestionAndAnswer')
    • #end #end #if ($threadOrReplyType == 'thread' && $core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_forumPermissions.ReviewAbuse, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, "%{ ApplicationId = $forum.ApplicationId, ApplicationTypeId = $core_v2_forum.ApplicationTypeId }").IsAllowed)
    • #end #if ($threadOrReplyType == 'thread' && $core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_forumPermissions.PinPost, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, "%{ ApplicationId = $forum.ApplicationId, ApplicationTypeId = $core_v2_forum.ApplicationTypeId }").IsAllowed) #set($daysFromToday = 0) #set($daysFromToday = $threadOrReply.StickyDate.Date.Subtract($core_v2_utility.CurrentDate.Date).TotalDays) #if(!$threadOrReply.IsSticky) #set($daysFromToday = 0) #end
    • #end
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_PostButton') $core_v2_language.GetResource('Cancel')
#registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.createEditPost') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end
